meta-review.comment: Qomp2 is a delightful and surprisingly perplexing adventure that breathes new life into the classic Pong concept. With its clever and innovative gameplay, this retro romp will test your patience and skills, delivering unexpected elements from start to finish. The peculiar movement scheme sets it apart as a puzzle platformer, offering a refreshing twist on a beloved classic. Though it may lack real replay value, each bounce is a joy thanks to its sleek design and intuitive mechanics. Qomp2 may not be for everyone, but for those willing to embrace its quirkiness, it's a blast.
